about_the_game:
OVAL RACECAR BUILDER!

This is the first-ever dedicated game to the UK Short Ovals made for PC! This first game in our Oval Racer Series is all about building that Oval RaceCar, starting from a quick simple rod to a banger and on to the Stockcars and HotRods we have it all in store for you, We know how boring a game can get playing on your own so in our first ever game we will also include a Multiplayer for you and your friends to join in.

Just think you own a RaceCar Bulder Garage! and you can get your friends to help build these racecars!

We then go on to more classes such as

  • CCRods
  • Bangers
  • 2ltr Hot Rods
  • Prod Rods
  • Saloon Rods

then to some stockcars, More will come as we get the licences to add them to the game.

For updates and the Dev Blog please join the Discord Server.


MORE INFORMATION TO COME AS WE ADD MORE TO THE GAME!

OVAL RACECAR BUILDER!

This is the first-ever dedicated game to the UK Short Ovals made for PC! This first game in our Oval Racer Series is all about building that Oval RaceCar, starting from a quick simple rod to a banger and on to the Stockcars and HotRods we have it all in store for you, We know how boring a game can get playing on your own so in our first ever game we will also include a Multiplayer for you and your friends to join in.

Just think you own a RaceCar Bulder Garage! and you can get your friends to help build these racecars!

We then go on to more classes such as

then to some stockcars, More will come as we get the licences to add them to the game.

name: Oval RaceCar Builder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: i5-6500 - AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: i7-7700K - AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
